DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of a new exercise machine designed to improve strength and speed of movement in the leg muscles. Investigators are trying to learn whether a new training method results in greater strength improvements as compared to a traditional method.
DOC.brief_title: A System for Lengthening Contraction Training of Muscle
DOC.criteria: healthy able to exercise 3 times per week for 16 weeks at Mobility Research Center under or overweight chronic disease that limits ability to exercise hips and legs limited by arthritis or pain presently engaged in a strenuous exercise program planned absence greater than one week.
